scripts.auth:json:perSpec: bash -lc 'rm -rf cypress/reports/auth-json cypress/reports/auth-html && mkdir -p cypress/reports/auth-json cypress/reports/auth-html && for f in cypress/e2e/auth/*.cy.js; do base=$(basename "$f" .cy.js); APP_URL=https://significant-darcey-kwikicity-3dda52ea.koyeb.app npx cypress run --spec "$f" --config trashAssetsBeforeRuns=false --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options "reportDir=cypress/reports/auth-json,reportFilename=$base,overwrite=true,html=false,json=true" || true; done'
scripts.auth:report: bash -lc 'npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/reports/auth-json/*.json" > cypress/reports/auth-html/merged.json && npx mochawesome-report-generator cypress/reports/auth-html/merged.json -o cypress/reports/auth-html --inline --reportFilename index'
